definition: to press against/to support/to prop up/to resist/to equal/to balance/to make up for/to mortgage/to arrive at/to clap (one's hands) lightly (expressing delight) (Taiwan pr. [zhi3] for this sense)
to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign

sentences.english: The property right need to be very clearly and blench of the pawn of bank.
sentences.chinese: 房产产权清晰，尽量回避银行抵押物业。

sentences.english: The debtor or a third party may offer a specific property as a pledge.
sentences.chinese: 债务人或者第三人可以提供一定的财产作为抵押物。

sentences.english: The registered gage has priority to the unregistered gage.
sentences.chinese: 抵押物已登记的先于未登记的受偿。

sentences.english: I have left the watch as pledge for borrowed money.
sentences.chinese: 我留下这块手表作为借款的抵押物。

sentences.chinese: 请你遵循企业动产抵押物登记工作程序。

sentences.english: The mortgager shall complete the registration of mortgaged property based on laws and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 抵押人必须依照法律规定办理抵押物的登记手续。

definition: to provide (an asset) as security for a loan/to put up collateral
security (property held against a loan)/mortgaged property
